name: Friendo Repairo
description:
Part of Global Game Jam 2020

YOU are the good dog, and your good robot friend is in trouble! Go on a quest to recover your robot friend's parts across three levels. Defeat your enemies by barking at them, jumping on them, or hide from them all together!

Controls:
WASD - Movement
E - Bark
Space - Jump

Credits:
